# Appendix for Chapter Two

## 2.1 Regression toward the mean (RTM)

```{r}
#

x<- rnorm(1000,2,2)
w1<- x + rnorm(1000,0,1)
w2<- x + rnorm(1000,0,1)
#
d<-data.frame(x,w1,w2)
# selection
ds<-d%>%filter(w1<2)

summary(ds$w1)
summary(ds$w2)

t.test(ds$w1,ds$w2)

wilcox.test(ds$w1,ds$w2)
```
